resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107016</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107016</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085890</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Why study a foreign language?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Warum studieren Sie eine Fremdsprache?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pourquoi étudiez une langue étrangère ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Por que estude uma língua extrangeira?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Perchè studi una lingua straniera?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γιατί μελετήστε μια ξένη γλώσσα;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Por qué estudie un idioma extranjero?</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Foreign language study enhances academic skills, raises SAT scores, and prepares students for careers.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fremdsprachestudie erhöht akademische Fähigkeiten, hebt 
GESESSENE Kerben an und bereitet Kursteilnehmer für Karrieren vor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'étude de langue étrangère met en valeur des 
qualifications d'universitaire, soulève les points REPOSÉS, et 
prépare des étudiants pour des carrières.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O estudo da língua extrangeira realça habilidades 
academic, levanta contagens SENTADAS, e prepara estudantes para 
carreiras.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo studio di lingua straniera aumenta le abilità 
accademiche, alza i segni SEDUTI e prepara gli allievi per le carriere.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μελέτη ξένης γλώσσας ενισχύει τις ακαδημαϊκές 
δεξιότητες, αυξάνει τα ΚΑΘΙΣΜΕΝΑ αποτελέσματα, και προετοιμάζει 
τους σπουδαστές για τις σταδιοδρομίες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El estudio del idioma extranjero realza habilidades 
académicas, levanta cuentas SENTADAS, y prepara a estudiantes para 
las carreras.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:BERNADETTE MORRIS
FN:BERNADETTE MORRIS
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085890</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107016</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/why-study-a-foreign-language</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
